DOC.criteria: 18 year old Referred exercise MPI due suspect coronary artery disease Acute Coronary Syndrome ( Unstable angina/NSTEMI/STEMI ) Preexcitation syndrome QRS duration > 120 ms Atrial Fibrillation significant ventricular arrhythmia Treatment Digoxin Pacemaker 100 % pacemaker dependence
